meaning: She is in the form of 3 aksharas (alphabets).
commentary: Bālatripurasundari mantra is composed of 3 alphabets.  Omkaara has 3 syllables- A, U, M. The 15 -syllabled mantra of the Supreme Mother also comprises of the 3 kūtas (portions within the mantra) -Vagbhava kūta, Madhyama kūta and Shakti kūta. For all these reasons, She is Tryakshari.
